law.catch_line: An applicant for a direct wine shipper's permit shall:...

text.section:
An applicant for a direct wine shipper's permit shall:
Submit to the Office of the Comptroller a completed application on a form that the Office of the Comptroller provides;
Provide to the Office of the Comptroller a copy of the applicant's current alcoholic beverages license; and
Pay a fee of $200 for initial issuance of the direct wine shipper's permit.
The Office of the Comptroller shall issue a direct wine shipper's permit to each applicant who meets the requirements of this title for the direct wine shipper's permit.
